short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads all the images and videos from a Mitene album.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to download all the images and videos from a Mitene album.  Just open the extension, click the download button, and walk away!

Features:
- Super simple to use.
- No parameters required.
- Continue where you last left off.
- Optional parameters to fine tune your experience.

Need more features or options?   Not working as expected?

No problem!  

The source code of the extension is available on my Github page (see the support site URL under the Support section).  Feel free to download it, update it, and make it do what you want!
